CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.4.k.2.1, medicinalproduct (70AN)
E2B (R3): G.k.2.2 Medicinal Product Name as Reported by the Primary Source Conformance: Required Data Type: 250AN OID: None Value Allowed: Free text
CustomField.inlineHelpText: User Guidance: The name should be that used by the reporter. It is recognized that a single product may have different proprietary names in different countries, even when produced by a single manufacturer.
CustomField.label: Product
